CreateableItemSpecContract.adc:Name: Application Control Wizard Policy Templates (Windows Empty)

adc:LocaleStringPairs.adc:LocaleStringPair: Skip the wizard, take me to blank policy

CreateableItemSpecContract.adc:Name: Application Control Wizard Policy Templates (Windows Monitoring)

adc:LocaleStringPairs.adc:LocaleStringPair: Audit the application executions triggered by this policy. This does not change how applications execute and it has no effect on end users. Use this type of policy as part of your discovery to continuously review activity on endpoints in a computer group. It helps you build controlling policies for the monitored applications.
What processes do you want this policy to monitor in this computer group?

CreateableItemSpecContract.adc:Name: Application Control Wizard Policy Templates (Windows Controlling)

adc:LocaleStringPairs.adc:LocaleStringPair: Allow Privilege Manager to manage how applications execute by applying actions to elevate, block, allow, and restrict execution rights. Use these types of policies to ensure only safe applications run with the correct access rights.
How do you want this policy to control processes on endpoints in this computer group?

CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Description: This action will display a customized message to the user and requires authentication by a member of the specified group if the end-user is not a member.
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Name: JonesCorp Group Member Authenticated Message Action
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.Xaml:
<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:adx="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2012/arelliadisplayxamlaction" xmlns:ac="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2010/xaml" xmlns:acs="http://schemas.arellia.com/silverlight/2012/acs" xmlns:axc="http://schemas.arellia.com/xaml/2014/xaml/common" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" mc:Ignorable="ac acs" Icon="Images/thycotic-icon.png" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen" ResizeMode="NoResize" SizeToContent="WidthAndHeight" adx:CustomXamlViewModel.AllowedAuthenticationAttempts="3" Topmost="True">
<Window.Resources>
<axc:LocaleResourceCollection x:Key="LocaleResources"> <axc:LocaleResourceSet> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationTitle" Value="Application Notice"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationLabel" Value="Application:"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="DateLabel" Value="Date:"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="GroupNameLabel" Value="Group name:"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="UserNameLabel" Value="User name:"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="PasswordLabel" Value="Password (required):"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="InformationTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12"><Run>This application has </Run><Bold>not been approved</Bold><Run> for use according to corporate policy.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="PasswordInformationSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12"><Run>This process requires authentication by a member of the following group.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="AuthorizationInformationSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12"><Run>Please have a member of this group authorize this request to continue.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ContinueButtonLabel" Value="Continue"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="CancelButtonLabel" Value="Cancel"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="TitlePrefix" Value="Application Notice"/> </axc:LocaleResourceSet> </axc:LocaleResourceCollection>
<!-- common control styles -->
<Style x:Key="BaseLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="10,3"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button"> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="15,3"/> <Setter Property="MinHeight" Value="25"/> <Setter Property="MinWidth" Value="85"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReadOnlyFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="IsReadOnly" Value="True"/> </Style>
<!-- specific element styles -->
<axc:StringFormatter x:Key="WindowTitle" FormatString="{}{0}: {1}"> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <Binding Path="[TitlePrefix]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}"/> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> <Binding Path="ProcessName"/> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> </axc:StringFormatter>
<sys:String x:Key="EncodedLogoImage"></sys:String>
<!-- heading -->
<Style x:Key="MainWindowPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="500"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FFF0F0F0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="HeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0,0,0,1"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FF777777"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Yellow"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationTitle],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="16"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#3d3d3d"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingStyle" TargetType="Image"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Height" Value="18"/> </Style>
<!-- content area -->
<Style x:Key="ContentPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InformationRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PropertiesPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ProcessName}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="EventDateLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [DateLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="EventDateFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Agent.EventDate}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PasswordSectionStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#804080FF"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FFDCE4FF"/> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Stretch"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="5"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PasswordRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,2,0,3"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Grid.ColumnSpan" Value="2"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseCredentialLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="6,3,0,0"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseCredentialFieldStyle" TargetType="FrameworkElement"> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="6,3,4,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="GroupNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [GroupNameLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="GroupNameFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding RequireAuthenticationFromGroupName}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="AuthorizationRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,6,0,5"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Grid.ColumnSpan" Value="2"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="3"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [UserNameLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="3"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding UserName,Mode=TwoWay,NotifyOnValidationError=True}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PasswordLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [PasswordLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="4"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PasswordBoxStyle" TargetType="PasswordBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="4"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="2"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InvalidPasswordStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseCredentialFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="5"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Grid.ColumnSpan" Value="2"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Red"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [Password]}"/> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap"/> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="GeneralErrorInfoStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="6"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Red"/> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Error}"/> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ButtonPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> <Setter Property="Orientation" Value="Horizontal"/> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ContinueButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [ContinueButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding ContinueCommand}"/> <Setter Property="CommandParameter" Value="{Binding ElementName=PasswordBox}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="CloseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [CancelButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding CloseCommand}"/> </Style>
</Window.Resources>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource MainWindowPanelStyle}" adx:WindowHelper.Title="{Binding Result,Source={StaticResource WindowTitle}}">
<Border Style="{StaticResource HeadingBorderStyle}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Border Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingBorderStyle}"> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingStyle}"/> </Border> <Border Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingBorderStyle}"> <Image Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingStyle}" acs:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}" adx:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}"/> </Border> </Grid> </Border>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ContentPanelStyle}">
<!-- Information of why this dialog needs attention --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InformationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/>
<!-- Details about detected process --> <Grid Style="{StaticResource PropertiesPanelStyle}"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationNameLabelStyle}"/> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationFieldStyle}"/>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource EventDateLabelStyle}"/> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource EventDateFieldStyle}"/>
</Grid>
<Border Style="{StaticResource PasswordSectionStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.HiddenWhenTrue="{Binding IsMemberOfGroup}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="20"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Border Width="14" Height="14" CornerRadius="7" Background="#FF4040FF" UseLayoutRounding="False" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Path Width="4.9" Height="8.517" Canvas.Left="4.4783" Canvas.Top="2.395" Stretch="Fill" Fill="#FFFFFFFF" Data="F1 M18.636,8.4816704 C18.636,9.0288897 18.3433,9.4976397 17.7579,9.8879204 C17.172501,10.2782 16.469299,10.4733 15.6485,10.4733 C14.811,10.4733 14.0995,10.2782 13.5141,9.8879204 C12.9287,9.4976397 12.636,9.0288897 12.636,8.4816704 C12.636,7.915 12.9329,7.4386101 13.5266,7.0524998 C14.1204,6.6663899 14.8277,6.47333 15.6485,6.47333 C16.4527,6.47333 17.1516,6.6663899 17.745399,7.0524998 C18.3391,7.4386101 18.636,7.915 18.636,8.4816704 z M21.436001,25.8067 L21.236,25.940001 C19.986,25.940001 18.181801,25.940001 15.8235,25.940001 C13.4693,25.940001 11.6735,25.940001 10.436,25.940001 L10.236,25.8067 L10.236,25.006701 L10.436,24.873301 C11.7318,24.848301 12.536,24.784401 12.8485,24.6817 C13.1193,24.603901 13.2673,24.3969 13.2922,24.060801 C13.3881,22.944201 13.436,21.7456 13.436,20.465 L13.436,18.623301 C13.436,16.956699 13.3318,15.9692 13.1235,15.6608 C13.0152,15.4886 12.7193,15.3803 12.236,15.3358 C12.0735,15.3192 11.4756,15.2983 10.4422,15.2733 L10.236,15.1358 L10.236,14.3608 L10.436,14.2067 C13.0068,14.0622 15.5985,13.7067 18.211,13.14 L18.636,13.3067 C18.369301,14.8817 18.236,16.2094 18.236,17.290001 L18.236,21.4233 C18.236,22.0539 18.283899,22.9317 18.3797,24.0567 C18.404699,24.392799 18.5506,24.599701 18.8172,24.6775 C19.125601,24.7831 19.9256,24.848301 21.217199,24.873301 L21.436001,25.006701 L21.436001,25.8067 z"/> </Border>
<RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource PasswordRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [PasswordInformationSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [PasswordInformationSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GroupNameLabelStyle}"/> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GroupNameFieldStyle}"/>
<!-- Required password section --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource AuthorizationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [AuthorizationInformationSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [AuthorizationInformationSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:VisibilityHelper.HiddenWhenTrue="{Binding IsMemberOfGroup}"/>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameLabelStyle}"/> <TextBox Style="{StaticResource UserNameFieldStyle}"/>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource PasswordLabelStyle}"/> <PasswordBox x:Name="PasswordBox" Style="{StaticResource PasswordBoxStyle}" ac:PasswordBoxHelper.PasswordChangesOnEvent="PasswordChanged" adx:PasswordBoxHelper.PasswordChangesOnEvent="PasswordChanged"/>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource InvalidPasswordStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenPopulated="{Binding [Password]}"/>
</Grid> </Border>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GeneralErrorInfoStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenPopulated="{Binding Error}"/>
<!-- Buttons at bottom --> <StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ButtonPanelStyle}"> <Button Style="{StaticResource ContinueButtonStyle}"/> <Button Style="{StaticResource CloseButtonStyle}"/> </StackPanel>
</StackPanel> </StackPanel> </Window>

ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Description: This policy elevates the rights for specified executables
ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Name: Authenticated Approval - node.exe

SecurityCatalogFilterContract.adc:Description: Filter used to detect Operating System Files and other trusted files dynamically on each system by using that machine's Signed Security Catalog. This filter does not need to be modified on the server.
SecurityCatalogFilterContract.adc:Name: Present in Signed Security Catalog

ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Description: This policy allows Operating System Files to run as-is.
ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Name: Allow Operating System Files Policy

CommandlineFilterContract.adc:Description: Identifies the MMC snap-in used to defragment disks in Windows XP.
CommandlineFilterContract.adc:Name: Defragment Component (dfrg.msc)

ResourceContract.adc:Description: This privilege identifies its holder as part of the trusted computer base. Some trusted protected subsystems are granted this privilege.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Act as part of the operating system

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to create a paging file.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Create a pagefile

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to load or unload a device driver.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Load and unload device drivers

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to assign the primary token of a process.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Replace a process-level token

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to modify the system time.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Change the system time

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to take ownership of an object without being granted discretionary access. This privilege allows the owner value to be set only to those values that the holder may legitimately assign as the owner of an object.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Take ownership of files or other objects

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to debug and adjust the memory of a process owned by another account.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Debug programs

ResourceContract.adc:Description: Required to create a primary token.
ResourceContract.adc:Name: Create a token object

AdjustProcessRightsContract.adc:Description: This action adds administrative rights for specified applications.
AdjustProcessRightsContract.adc:Name: Add Administrative Rights

Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Description: Filter used to identify the Microsoft Management Console utility.
Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Name: Microsoft Management Console (mmc.exe)

ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Description: Elevates privileges of users to allow them to defragment their hard disks on Windows XP.
ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Name: Client Option - Elevate Disk Defragmentation (XP)

CommandlineFilterContract.adc:Description: Filter used to identify the Add Printer UI applet.
CommandlineFilterContract.adc:Name: Add Printer Commandline Arguments

Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Description: Filter used to identify the dynamic library loader utility used by Windows to launch various system configuration applets.
Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Name: Library Loader Utility (rundll32.exe)

ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Description: Elevates privileges of users to allow printer drivers to be installed through the Control Panel
ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Name: Client Option - Elevate Adding Printers via Control Panel

Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Description: Filter used to identify the Install/Uninstall of Display Languages setup utility for Windows.
Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Name: Setup Display Languages Utility (lpksetup.exe)

ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Description: Elevates privileges of users to allow display languages to be installed
ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Name: Client Option - Elevate Installing Display Languages

Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Description: Filter used to identify the Device Pairing Wizard that appears when you click Add Device in Windows Vista and Windows 7.
Win32ExeFilterContract.adc:Name: Device Pairing Wizard

ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Description: Elevates privileges of users to allow new drivers to be installed during the device pairing wizard.
ApplicationControlPolicyContract.adc:Name: Client Option - Elevate Device Pairing

CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Description: This action will display a approval request form for approval before allowing application to run.
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Name: Approval Request Form Action
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.Xaml:
<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:adx="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2012/arelliadisplayxamlaction" xmlns:ac="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2010/xaml" xmlns:acs="http://schemas.arellia.com/silverlight/2012/acs" xmlns:axc="http://schemas.arellia.com/xaml/2014/xaml/common" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" mc:Ignorable="ac acs" Icon="Images/thycotic-icon.png" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen" ResizeMode="NoResize" SizeToContent="WidthAndHeight" Topmost="True">
<Window.Resources>
<axc:LocaleResourceCollection x:Key="LocaleResources"> <axc:LocaleResourceSet> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationTitle" Value="Application Notice" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="UserLabel" Value="User:" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationLabel" Value="Application:" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ReasonLabel" Value="Reason (required):" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="InformationTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph><Run>This application has </Run><Bold><Run>not been approved</Run></Bold><Run> for use according to corporate policy. Please discontinue use or enter your justification to continue.</Run></Paragraph> <!--<Paragraph><Run>This application has </Run><Bold><Run>not been approved</Run></Bold><Run> for use according to </Run><Hyperlink TargetName="_blank" NavigateUri="http://www.example.com/policy.html"><Run>corporate policy</Run></Hyperlink><Run>. Please discontinue use or enter your justification to continue.</Run></Paragraph>--> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="InstructionTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph><Run>Type a brief explanation describing why this application is necessary. This explanation will form part of the request and will be reviewed by IT staff in consideration of this request.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ContinueButtonLabel" Value="Continue" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="CancelButtonLabel" Value="Cancel" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="RefreshButtonLabel" Value="Refresh" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="TitlePrefix" Value="Application Notice" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="FlowDirection" Value="LeftToRight" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="DefaultFontSize" Value="11" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApprovalStatusLabel" Value="Approval status:" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApprovalStatusTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph><Run>A previous request for this application has been submitted for review.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> </axc:LocaleResourceSet> </axc:LocaleResourceCollection>
<!-- common control styles -->
<Style x:Key="BaseLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="10,3" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button"> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="15,3" /> <Setter Property="MinHeight" Value="25" /> <Setter Property="MinWidth" Value="85" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReadOnlyFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="IsReadOnly" Value="True" /> <Setter Property="IsTabStop" Value="False" /> </Style>
<!-- specific element styles -->
<axc:StringFormatter x:Key="WindowTitle" FormatString="{}{0}: {1}"> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <Binding Path="[TitlePrefix]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> <Binding Path="ProcessName" /> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> </axc:StringFormatter>
<sys:String x:Key="EncodedLogoImage"></sys:String>
<!-- heading -->
<Style x:Key="MainWindowPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="500" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FFF0F0F0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="HeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0,0,0,1" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FF777777" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Yellow" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationTitle],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="16" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#3d3d3d" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingStyle" TargetType="Image"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="18" /> <Setter Property="FlowDirection" Value="{Binding [FlowDirection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> </Style>
<!-- content area -->
<Style x:Key="ContentPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InformationRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PropertiesPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ProcessName}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [UserLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding UserName}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReasonSectionPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InstructionRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReasonLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ReasonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0,2" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,5,0,0" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReasonTextBoxStyle" TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="TabIndex" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="AcceptsReturn" Value="True" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="64" /> <Setter Property="ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" Value="Disabled" /> <Setter Property="ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility" Value="Auto" /> <!-- Reason field in DataClass is limited to nvarchar(255); set maximum length accordingly --> <Setter Property="MaxLength" Value="250" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ReasonText,Mode=TwoWay,UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="GeneralErrorInfoStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="5" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Red" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Error}" /> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed" /> </Style>
<!-- Approval Status -->
<Style x:Key="ApprovalStatusSectionPanelStyle" TargetType="Grid"> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed" /> </Style>
<SolidColorBrush x:Key="ApprovedBackgroundBrush" Color="ForestGreen" /> <SolidColorBrush x:Key="DeniedBackgroundBrush" Color="Red" /> <SolidColorBrush x:Key="DefaultBackgroundBrush" Color="DimGray" />
<adx:ApprovalStatusBrushProvider x:Key="ApprovalStatusBrushProvider" ApprovedBrush="{StaticResource ApprovedBackgroundBrush}" DeniedBrush="{StaticResource DeniedBackgroundBrush}" DefaultBrush="{StaticResource DefaultBackgroundBrush}" />
<Style x:Key="ApprovalStatusBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,3" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApprovalRequestStatusInformationRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8" /> <Setter Property="Grid.ColumnSpan" Value="2" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApprovalStatusLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApprovalStatusLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0,2" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,0,5,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApprovalStatusFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ApprovalStatus}" /> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BottomActionPanelStyle" TargetType="Grid"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ButtonPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Orientation" Value="Horizontal" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ContinueWithReasonButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [ContinueButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding ContinueWithReasonCommand}" /> <Setter Property="CommandParameter" Value="{Binding ReasonText}" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ContinueButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [ContinueButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding ContinueCommand}" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0" /> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="RefreshButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [RefreshButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding RefreshApprovalCommand}" /> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="CloseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [CancelButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding CloseCommand}" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0" /> </Style>
</Window.Resources>
<Window.FlowDirection> <Binding Path="[FlowDirection]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </Window.FlowDirection>
<Window.FontSize> <Binding Path="[DefaultFontSize]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </Window.FontSize>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource MainWindowPanelStyle}" adx:WindowHelper.Title="{Binding Result,Source={StaticResource WindowTitle}}">
<Border Style="{StaticResource HeadingBorderStyle}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Border Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingBorderStyle}"> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingStyle}" /> </Border> <Border Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingBorderStyle}"> <Image Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingStyle}" acs:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}" adx:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}" /> </Border> </Grid> </Border>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ContentPanelStyle}">
<!-- Information of why this dialog needs attention --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InformationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" />
<!-- Details about detected process --> <Grid Style="{StaticResource PropertiesPanelStyle}"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition /> <RowDefinition /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationNameLabelStyle}" /> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationFieldStyle}" />
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameLabelStyle}" /> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameFieldStyle}" />
</Grid>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ReasonSectionPanelStyle}" ac:VisibilityHelper.HiddenWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}" adx:VisibilityHelper.HiddenWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}">
<!-- Instruction for Reason field --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InstructionRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InstructionTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InstructionTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" />
<!-- Reason field --> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ReasonLabelStyle}" /> <TextBox Style="{StaticResource ReasonTextBoxStyle}" adx:FocusHelper.FocusOnLoaded="True" /> </StackPanel>
<Grid Style="{StaticResource ApprovalStatusSectionPanelStyle}" ac:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<!-- Information for Approval Status --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource ApprovalRequestStatusInformationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [ApprovalStatusTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [ApprovalStatusTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" />
<!-- Approval Status field --> <Border Style="{StaticResource ApprovalStatusBorderStyle}" adx:ApprovalStatusBrush.Provider="{StaticResource ApprovalStatusBrushProvider}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApprovalStatusLabelStyle}" /> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApprovalStatusFieldStyle}" /> </Grid> </Border> </Grid>
<!-- Shows any general errors --> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GeneralErrorInfoStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenPopulated="{Binding Error}" />
<!-- Buttons at bottom --> <Grid Style="{StaticResource BottomActionPanelStyle}"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Button Style="{StaticResource RefreshButtonStyle}" ac:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}" />
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ButtonPanelStyle}"> <Button Style="{StaticResource ContinueWithReasonButtonStyle}" ac:VisibilityHelper.HiddenWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}" adx:VisibilityHelper.HiddenWhenTrue="{Binding IsPendingApproval}" adx:ButtonHelper.IsDefault="true" /> <Button Style="{StaticResource ContinueButtonStyle}" ac:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenTrue="{Binding IsRequestApproved}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenTrue="{Binding IsRequestApproved}" adx:ButtonHelper.IsDefault="true" /> <Button Style="{StaticResource CloseButtonStyle}" adx:ButtonHelper.IsCancel="true" /> </StackPanel> </Grid>
</StackPanel> </StackPanel> </Window>

CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Description: This action will display a modal denial notification message to the user and prevent application execution on Windows.
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Name: Application Denied Message Action VirusTotal
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.Xaml:
<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:adx="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2012/arelliadisplayxamlaction" xmlns:ac="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2010/xaml" xmlns:acs="http://schemas.arellia.com/silverlight/2012/acs" xmlns:axc="http://schemas.arellia.com/xaml/2014/xaml/common" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" xmlns:i="clr-namespace:System.Windows.Interactivity;assembly=System.Windows.Interactivity" mc:Ignorable="ac acs" Icon="Images/thycotic-icon.png" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen" ResizeMode="NoResize" SizeToContent="WidthAndHeight" Topmost="True">
<Window.Resources>
<axc:LocaleResourceCollection x:Key="LocaleResources"> <axc:LocaleResourceSet> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationTitle" Value="Application Denied VirusTotal"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="UserLabel" Value="User:"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationLabel" Value="Application:"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="InformationTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value><Section xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12"> <Run>
This application is not approved according to corporate policy due to Virus Total Reputation Score. </Run> </Paragraph> </Section></axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="TitlePrefix" Value="Application Denied"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="FlowDirection" Value="LeftToRight"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="CancelButtonLabel" Value="Close"/> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="DefaultFontSize" Value="11"/> </axc:LocaleResourceSet> </axc:LocaleResourceCollection>
<!-- common control styles -->
<Style x:Key="BaseLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="10,3"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button"> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="15,3"/> <Setter Property="MinHeight" Value="25"/> <Setter Property="MinWidth" Value="85"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReadOnlyFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="IsReadOnly" Value="True"/> <Setter Property="IsTabStop" Value="False"/> </Style>
<!-- specific element styles -->
<axc:StringFormatter x:Key="WindowTitle" FormatString="{}{0}: {1}"> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <Binding Path="[TitlePrefix]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}"/> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> <Binding Path="ProcessName"/> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> </axc:StringFormatter>
<axc:StringFormatter x:Key="ClosingMessageFormatter"> <axc:StringFormatter.FormatString> <Binding Path="[ClosingMessageFormatString]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}"/> </axc:StringFormatter.FormatString> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <Binding Path="TimeRemaining.TotalSeconds" ElementName="CloseAction"/> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> </axc:StringFormatter>
<sys:String x:Key="EncodedLogoImage"></sys:String>
<!-- heading -->
<Style x:Key="MainWindowPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="500"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FFF0F0F0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="HeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0,0,0,1"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FF777777"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Red"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationTitle],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="16"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="White"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#3d3d3d"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingStyle" TargetType="Image"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Height" Value="18"/> <Setter Property="FlowDirection" Value="{Binding [FlowDirection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<!-- content area -->
<Style x:Key="ContentPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InformationRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PropertiesPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ProcessName}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [UserLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding UserName}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="AutoCloseInfoStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Result,Source={StaticResource ClosingMessageFormatter}}"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="GeneralErrorInfoStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="5"/> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Red"/> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap"/> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Error}"/> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ButtonPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> <Setter Property="Orientation" Value="Horizontal"/> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key="CloseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [CancelButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding CloseCommand}"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0"/> </Style>
</Window.Resources>
<Window.FlowDirection> <Binding Path="[FlowDirection]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}"/> </Window.FlowDirection>
<Window.FontSize> <Binding Path="[DefaultFontSize]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}"/> </Window.FontSize>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource MainWindowPanelStyle}" adx:WindowHelper.Title="{Binding Result,Source={StaticResource WindowTitle}}">
<Border Style="{StaticResource HeadingBorderStyle}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Border Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingBorderStyle}"> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingStyle}"/> </Border> <Border Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingBorderStyle}"> <Image Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingStyle}" acs:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}" adx:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}"/> </Border> </Grid> </Border>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ContentPanelStyle}">
<!-- Information of why this dialog needs attention --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InformationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}"/>
<!-- Details about detected process --> <Grid Style="{StaticResource PropertiesPanelStyle}"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationNameLabelStyle}"/> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationFieldStyle}"/>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameLabelStyle}"/> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameFieldStyle}"/>
</Grid>
<!-- Shows any general errors --> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GeneralErrorInfoStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenPopulated="{Binding Error}"/>
<!-- Buttons at bottom --> <StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ButtonPanelStyle}"> <Button Style="{StaticResource CloseButtonStyle}" adx:FocusHelper.FocusOnLoaded="true" adx:ButtonHelper.IsDefault="true" adx:ButtonHelper.IsCancel="true"/> </StackPanel>
</StackPanel> </StackPanel> </Window>

CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Description: This action will display a justification prompt to the user before continuing to the process controlled by a policy.
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.adc:Name: Justify Application Elevation Action
CustomXamlExecutionActionContract.Xaml:
<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:adx="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2012/arelliadisplayxamlaction" xmlns:ac="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2010/xaml" xmlns:acs="http://schemas.arellia.com/silverlight/2012/acs" xmlns:axc="http://schemas.arellia.com/xaml/2014/xaml/common" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" mc:Ignorable="ac acs" Icon="Images/thycotic-icon.png" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen" ResizeMode="NoResize" SizeToContent="WidthAndHeight" Topmost="True">
<Window.Resources>
<axc:LocaleResourceCollection x:Key="LocaleResources"> <axc:LocaleResourceSet> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationTitle" Value="Application Elevation" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="UserLabel" Value="User:" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ApplicationLabel" Value="Application:" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ReasonLabel" Value="Reason (required):" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="InformationTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12"><Run>Please provide a reason as to why you require this application to be run with elevated rights.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="InstructionTextSection"> <axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> <Section xml:space="preserve"> <Paragraph FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12"><Run>Type a brief explanation describing why this application is necessary. This explanation </Run><Bold>will be recorded</Bold><Run> and may be reviewed by the IT staff for consideration into corporate policy.</Run></Paragraph> </Section> </axc:StringKeyedResource.Value> </axc:StringKeyedResource> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="ContinueButtonLabel" Value="Continue" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="CancelButtonLabel" Value="Cancel" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="RefreshButtonLabel" Value="Refresh" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="TitlePrefix" Value="Application Elevation" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="FlowDirection" Value="LeftToRight" /> <axc:StringKeyedResource Key="DefaultFontSize" Value="11" /> </axc:LocaleResourceSet> </axc:LocaleResourceCollection>
<!-- common control styles -->
<Style x:Key="BaseLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="10,3" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button"> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="15,3" /> <Setter Property="MinHeight" Value="25" /> <Setter Property="MinWidth" Value="85" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReadOnlyFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="BaseRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="IsReadOnly" Value="True" /> <Setter Property="IsTabStop" Value="False" /> </Style>
<!-- specific element styles -->
<axc:StringFormatter x:Key="WindowTitle" FormatString="{}{0}: {1}"> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <Binding Path="[TitlePrefix]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> <Binding Path="ProcessName" /> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> </axc:StringFormatter>
<sys:String x:Key="EncodedLogoImage"></sys:String>
<!-- heading -->
<Style x:Key="MainWindowPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="500" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FFF0F0F0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="HeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0,0,0,1" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FF777777" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Orange" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationTitle],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="16" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#3d3d3d" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingStyle" TargetType="Image"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="18" /> <Setter Property="FlowDirection" Value="{Binding [FlowDirection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> </Style>
<!-- content area -->
<Style x:Key="ContentPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InformationRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="PropertiesPanelStyle" TargetType="Panel"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ApplicationFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="0" /> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ProcessName}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseLabelStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [UserLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="UserNameFieldStyle" TargetType="TextBlock" BasedOn="{StaticResource ReadOnlyFieldStyle}"> <Setter Property="Grid.Row" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding UserName}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReasonSectionPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> </Style>
<Style x:Key="InstructionRichTextBoxStyle" TargetType="RichTextBox" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseRichTextBoxStyle}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReasonLabelStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ReasonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0,2" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,5,0,0" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ReasonTextBoxStyle" TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="TabIndex" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="AcceptsReturn" Value="True" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="64" /> <Setter Property="ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" Value="Disabled" /> <Setter Property="ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility" Value="Auto" /> <!-- Reason field in DataClass is limited to nvarchar(255); set maximum length accordingly --> <Setter Property="MaxLength" Value="250" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding ReasonText,Mode=TwoWay,UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="GeneralErrorInfoStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="5" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Red" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Error}" /> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ButtonPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> <Setter Property="Orientation" Value="Horizontal" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ContinueWithReasonButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [ContinueButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding ContinueWithReasonCommand}" /> <Setter Property="CommandParameter" Value="{Binding ReasonText}" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="CloseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [CancelButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding CloseCommand}" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0" /> </Style>
</Window.Resources>
<Window.FlowDirection> <Binding Path="[FlowDirection]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </Window.FlowDirection>
<Window.FontSize> <Binding Path="[DefaultFontSize]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </Window.FontSize>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource MainWindowPanelStyle}" adx:WindowHelper.Title="{Binding Result,Source={StaticResource WindowTitle}}">
<Border Style="{StaticResource HeadingBorderStyle}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Border Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingBorderStyle}"> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleHeadingStyle}" /> </Border> <Border Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingBorderStyle}"> <Image Style="{StaticResource ImageHeadingStyle}" acs:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}" adx:ImageSourceHelper.EncodedImage="{StaticResource EncodedLogoImage}" /> </Border> </Grid> </Border>
<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ContentPanelStyle}">
<!-- Information of why this dialog needs attention --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InformationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" />
<!-- Details about detected process --> <Grid Style="{StaticResource PropertiesPanelStyle}"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition /> <RowDefinition /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationNameLabelStyle}" /> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ApplicationFieldStyle}" />
<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameLabelStyle}" /> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameFieldStyle}" />
</Grid>
<!-- Instruction for Reason field --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InstructionRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InstructionTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InstructionTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" />
<!-- Reason field --> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource ReasonLabelStyle}" /> <TextBox Style="{StaticResource ReasonTextBoxStyle}" adx:FocusHelper.FocusOnLoaded="true" />
<!-- Shows any general errors --> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GeneralErrorInfoStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenPopulated="{Binding Error}" />
<!-- Buttons at bottom --> <StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ButtonPanelStyle}"> <Button Style="{StaticResource ContinueWithReasonButtonStyle}" adx:ButtonHelper.IsDefault="true" /> <Button Style="{StaticResource CloseButtonStyle}" adx:ButtonHelper.IsCancel="true" /> </StackPanel>
</StackPanel> </StackPanel> </Window>

<Window xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:adx="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2012/arelliadisplayxamlaction" xmlns:ac="http://schemas.arellia.com/winfx/2010/xaml" xmlns:acs="http://schemas.arellia.com/silverlight/2012/acs" xmlns:axc="http://schemas.arellia.com/xaml/2014/xaml/common" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" xmlns:i="clr-namespace:System.Windows.Interactivity;assembly=System.Windows.Interactivity" mc:Ignorable="ac acs" Icon="Images/thycotic-icon.png" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen" ResizeMode="NoResize" SizeToContent="WidthAndHeight" Topmost="True">

<axc:StringFormatter x:Key="WindowTitle" FormatString="{}{0}: {1}"> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <Binding Path="[TitlePrefix]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter0> <axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> <Binding Path="ProcessName" /> </axc:StringFormatter.Parameter1> </axc:StringFormatter>

<Style x:Key="TitleHeadingStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding [ApplicationTitle],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="16" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="White" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ImageHeadingBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="Grid.Column" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#3d3d3d" /> </Style>

<Style x:Key="GeneralErrorInfoStyle" TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="5" /> <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="Bold" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Red" /> <Setter Property="TextWrapping" Value="Wrap" /> <Setter Property="Text" Value="{Binding Error}" /> <Setter Property="Visibility" Value="Collapsed" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="ButtonPanelStyle" TargetType="StackPanel"> <Setter Property="Orientation" Value="Horizontal" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,8,0,0" /> </Style>
<Style x:Key="CloseButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseButtonStyle}"> <Setter Property="Content" Value="{Binding [CancelButtonLabel],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" /> <Setter Property="Command" Value="{Binding CloseCommand}" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="8,0,0,0" /> </Style>
</Window.Resources>

<Window.FontSize> <Binding Path="[DefaultFontSize]" Source="{StaticResource LocaleResources}" /> </Window.FontSize>

<StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ContentPanelStyle}">
<!-- Information of why this dialog needs attention --> <RichTextBox Style="{StaticResource InformationRichTextBoxStyle}" ac:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" adx:RichTextBoxHelper.Section="{Binding [InformationTextSection],Source={StaticResource LocaleResources}}" />

<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameLabelStyle}" /> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource UserNameFieldStyle}" />
</Grid>
<!-- Shows any general errors --> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource GeneralErrorInfoStyle}" adx:VisibilityHelper.VisibleWhenPopulated="{Binding Error}" />
<!-- Buttons at bottom --> <StackPanel Style="{StaticResource ButtonPanelStyle}"> <Button Style="{StaticResource CloseButtonStyle}" adx:FocusHelper.FocusOnLoaded="true" adx:ButtonHelper.IsDefault="true" adx:ButtonHelper.IsCancel="true" /> </StackPanel>
</StackPanel> </StackPanel> </Window>
